question: What is the central healthcare facility located in the southern part of Trakai, Lithuania?
true_answer: Trakai District Central Hospital and Polyclinic.
asked_question_translated: Aké centrálne zdravotnícke zariadenie sa nachádza v južnej časti mesta Trakai v Litve?
answer: V južnej časti mesta Trakai v Litve sa nachádza Trakai Hospital.
answer_translated_eng: In the southern part of the city of Trakai in Lithuania is located Trakai Hospital.
